Package de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.melt.matching_jena_matchers.util

Class WiktionarySynsetCSV

java.lang.Object
de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.melt.matching_jena_matchers.util.WiktionarySynsetCSV
public class WiktionarySynsetCSV extends Object
Generates a CSV (first element is source - all others are synonyms) based on a DBnary dump file. You can read more about DBnary in the following article: SÃ©rasset Gilles (2014). DBnary: Wiktionary as a Lemon-Based Multilingual Lexical Resource in RDF. to appear in Semantic Web Journal (special issue on Multilingual Linked Open Data).

  • Method Details

    • generateCSVFile

      public static void generateCSVFile(String path, String csvFile)
      Extracts synonyms from a dbnary dump and writes the synonyms to a csv file.
      Parameters:
      path - path to the the dbnary dump
      csvFile - csv file which contains the synonyms as source, syn1, syn2, syn3

    • generateCSVFile

      public static void generateCSVFile(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model m, File csvFile)
      Extracts synsonyms from a jena model of the dbnary dump and writes the synonyms to a csv file
      Parameters:
      m - a jena model of the dbnary dump (can be tdb packed or not)
      csvFile - csv file which contains the synonyms as source, syn1, syn2, syn3

    • loadCsvFile

      public static Map<String,Set<String>> loadCsvFile(String csvFile)

    • loadCsvFile

      public static Map<String,Set<String>> loadCsvFile(File csvFile)
      Load the csv file and returns a map with key as original word and value as a set of synonyms.
      Parameters:
      csvFile - the csv file to load
      Returns:
      map of original word to synonyms

    • loadCsvFileAsReplacementMapWithAllKeys

      public static Map<String,Set<String>> loadCsvFileAsReplacementMapWithAllKeys(File csvFile)
      Load a csv file of synonyms and returns a map where the key is a word/phrase and the value is the corresponding sysnset representative. Usually this is named as synset_id. If a word appears multiple times, then multiple values appear in the set.
      Parameters:
      csvFile - the csv file to load
      Returns:
      map where the key is a word/phrase and the value is the corresponding sysnset representative

    • loadCsvFileAsReplacementMapWithAllKeys

      public static Map<String,Set<String>> loadCsvFileAsReplacementMapWithAllKeys(File csvFile, Function<String,String> preprocessing)
      Load a csv file of synonyms and returns a map where the key is a word/phrase and the value is the corresponding sysnset representative. Usually this is named as synset_id. If a word appears multiple times, then multiple values appear in the set.
      Parameters:
      csvFile - the csv file to load
      preprocessing - the function which is applied to every synonym
      Returns:
      map where the key is a word/phrase and the value is the corresponding sysnset representative

    • loadCsvFileAsReplacementMap

      public static Map<String,String> loadCsvFileAsReplacementMap(File csvFile)
      Load a csv file of synonyms and returns a map where the key is a word/phrase and the value is the corresponding sysnset representative. Usually this is named as synset_id. If a word appears multiple times, then only the last occurance is used. Therefore it is recommendable to load a transitive closure of a synonym file.
      Parameters:
      csvFile - the csv file to load
      Returns:
      map where the key is a word/phrase and the value is the corresponding sysnset representative

    • addSynonyms

      private static void addSynonyms(Set<String> synonyms, org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource r)
      Add synonyms from a resource which has a synonyms relation
      Parameters:
      synonyms - the set in which all new synoyms are added
      r - resource

    • getLemmaFromURI

      private static String getLemmaFromURI(String uri)
      Given a resource URI, this method will transform it to a lemma.
      Parameters:
      uri - Resource URI to be transformed.
      Returns:
      Lemma.
